api.endpoints package

Submodules

api.endpoints.login module

async api.endpoints.login.login_for_access_token(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm) → Token

Endpoint to grant access to user throug access token.

Parameters:

form_data (Annotated[OAuth2PasswordRequestForm, Depends) – data provide from user

Raises:

HTTPException – In case that user type incorrect password or is not created on database.

Returns:

Access token response.

Return type:

Token

api.endpoints.logout module

async api.endpoints.logout.user_checkout(current_user: User)

Change to enabled the user status.

Parameters:

current_user (Annotated[User, Depends) – email of active user

Raises:

HTTPException – in case that token was invalid

Returns:

http status 200 message.

Return type:

FastAPI Response

api.endpoints.ping module

api.endpoints.ping.ping()

Sends a simple request and expects a quick response, indicating that the server is up and running.

Raises:

HTTPException – Error in case of database have not connection.

Returns:

Pong response (the server is up and running).

Return type:

Response

api.endpoints.signin module

api.endpoints.signin.save_new_user(user: User)

Add new user to database

Parameters:

user (UserCreate) – User schema with all user attributes.

Raises:

HTTPException – In case of user already exists

Returns:

Successfull sign in message.

Return type:

Response
